trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of controls contained on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 上所包含的控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control returns an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> which you can cast to an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項會傳回類型的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>其中您可以轉換成類型的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection> includes controls such as the editing control and the scrollbars on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection>包含控制項，例如，編輯控制項和捲軸上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Removes all controls from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中移除所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all controls from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, except the scroll bars and the editing control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法會移除所有的控制項，從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，除了捲軸和編輯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 陣列，是從目前集合複製的元素之目的端。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 中以零起始的索引，複製作業從此處開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 的內容複製到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 陣列中 (從目標陣列的指定索引開始)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of elements in the source collection is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源集合中的元素數大於 <paramref name="index" /> 與 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾之間的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source element cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 來源元素的型別不能自動轉換為 <paramref name="array" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <c>value</c> 之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 中的指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than or equal to the current number of controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或是大於或等於目前在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 中的控制項數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified control from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewControlCollection" /> 中移除指定的控制項。
